7.2 The Transcendentals module

$single-e

Constant

Summary

The value of e, the base of natural logarithms, as a single precision floating point number.

Type

<single-float>

Superclass

<float>

Library

common-extensions

Module

transcendentals

Description

The value of e, the base of natural logarithms, as a single precision floating point number.

See also

See the constant $double-e, page 174.
